title: Portsmouth's premier rehearsal studios
body:
# Music Rehearsal Studio in Portsmouth

Casemates has been an established music rehearsal studio since 1994 and is suitable for bands at any stage of their development. We have four rehearsal studios, each equipped with professional backline, valve guitar amps and active PA systems.

Weâ€™re situated in the Hilsea Lines in Portsmouth. An 18th Century fortification full of history and impressive architecture. We occupy a grade 2 listed building.
